amendment.description: To prohibit the application of certain restrictive eligibility requirements to foreign nongovernmental organizations with respect to the provision of assistance under part I of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1141 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1141 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 53. Record Vote Number: 267.

Amendment SA 1141 proposed by Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9095-9104; text: CR S9095) To prohibit the application of certain restrictive eligibility requirements to foreign nongovernmental organizations with respect to the provision of assistance under part I of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1141 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 53. Record Vote Number: 267.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1141 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1141 proposed by Senator Boxer to Amendment SA 1136.
